deleteAllDialog.title: Delete All Challenge Trackers
deleteAllDialog.body: Are you sure you wish to delete all Challenge Trackers?

form.title: Challenge Tracker List

trackerOptions.title: Title
trackerOptions.titleTooltip: The title of the challenge tracker
trackerOptions.scrollTooltip: Use the scroll wheel to increase and decrease segments
trackerOptions.sizeTooltip: The size of the challenge tracker in pixels
trackerOptions.showTooltip: Show the challenge tracker to others
trackerOptions.windowedTooltip: Display the challenge tracker in a window
trackerOptions.outerTotalTooltip: The number of total segments on the outer track
trackerOptions.outerCurrentTooltip: The number of currently set segments on the outer track
trackerOptions.outerBackgroundColorTooltip: The hex color of unset segments on the outer track
trackerOptions.outerColorTooltip: The hex color of the set segments on the outer track
trackerOptions.innerTotalTooltip: The number of total segments on the inner track
trackerOptions.innerCurrentTooltip: The number of currently set segments on the inner track
trackerOptions.innerBackgroundColorTooltip: The hex color of the unset segments on the inner track
trackerOptions.innerColorTooltip: The hex color of the set segments on the inner track
trackerOptions.backgroundImageTooltip: The background image of the challenge tracker
trackerOptions.foregroundImageTooltip: The image of the set segments on the outer and inner track
trackerOptions.frameColorTooltip: The hex color of the frame

errors.notAllowed: Function '{function}' is not allowed for the user.
errors.notOwned: Challenge Tracker '{value}' is not owned by the user.
errors.notSupplied: Parameter '{parameter}' was not supplied to function '{function}'.

allowShow.name: Allow Show to Others
allowShow.hint: GM setting: Allow users with this role (and above) to show Challenge Trackers to others (Requires reload)
